Author: KB
Title: Paul R. La Monica states: "Boston is the new Silicon Valley"
Content: The title to this article is a bit misleading, but at least it points to opportunity outside Silicon Valley.

Author: Goladus
Content:
which you check 144 times per day assuming you use Gmail

Which is probably not a good assumption to make. Tons of people are using gmail, or hotmail or some other email with a web interface, but it's not everyone. So long as facebook messages can be checked from any computer, versus email which is usually checked from home, people will still use both.

Author: luccastera
Title: Coding Horror: You're Probably Storing Passwords Incorrectly

Author: brlewis
Content: I've been developing web apps too long to be confident that I can say how easy it is to learn.  Post a web app you've made and at least I'll have a little data.

Author: ratsbane
Content: I just looked at eser.org.  Neat-o.  Have you thought about adding a comments/ratings system or features matrix?

Author: bluishgreen
Content: I think this is just one issue that attaches people to their products.Nevertheless this is a nice starting point to think about this. What are the products that you are attached to, and why do you think you are attached to them?

Author: bluishgreen
Title: Why do people become attached to their products
Content: I think this is just one issue that attaches people to their products.Nevertheless this is a nice starting point to think about this. What are the products that you are attached to, and why do you think you are attached to them?
